snippet: The Japanese phone carrier’s proposal of $8.5 billion for Universal Media Group was believed by some analysts to represent a $2 billion premium over its value.
abstract: French media conglomerate Vivendi rejects $8.5 billion cash bid from SoftBank for Universal Music Group, even though it represents premium of at least $2 billion more than some analysts' estimates of its value.
lead_paragraph: The Japanese phone carrier’s proposal of $8.5 billion for Universal Media Group was believed by some analysts to represent a $2 billion premium over its value.

headline.main: Vivendi Declined SoftBank’s Lucrative Offer for Universal
headline.print_headline: Vivendi Declined SoftBank’s Lucrative Offer for Universal
